      getRelatedCustomer: Returns the ID of a different customer who has also bought the productID

    • Method Detail

      • registerPurchase

        void registerPurchase(long customerID,
                    long productId)
        registerPurchase: Called when a product purchase is made by a customer
        Parameters:
        customerID - the id of the customer who made the purchase
        productId - the id of the product which was purchased

      • getRelatedProducts

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getRelatedProducts(long customerID,
                                                     long productId,
                                                     int numProducts)
        getRelatedProducts: Returns the next `numProducts` products related to this product
        Parameters:
        customerID - the id of the customer for which the related products are needed
        productId - the id of the product for which the related products are needed
        numProducts - the number of related products required
        Returns:
        Returns the next `numProducts` products related to this product

        getRelatedCustomer: Returns the ID of a different customer who has also bought the productID
        Parameters:

        productID - the id of the product for which the related customers are needed
        Returns:
        the ID of a different customer who has also bought the productID
